RelatedSentence: Google 's photo sharing site of choice has long been Google+ , but today it 's joining what 's arguably a far more popular one : Instagram .
Google announced this afternoon that it has  opened up an Instagram account , kicking things off with a short video of today 's spinning Rubik 's Cube doodle .

It only has the one post so far , but it 's following accounts for YouTube , Google Maps , and Google Glass , in case you 're hungry for more tech in your Instagram feed .

At the end of the day , the new account is really just another advertising vehicle for Google - it also has accounts on Facebook and Twitter - but Google suggests it 'll be a fun way to follow along nonetheless .
